articles.title: BULLETIN
articles.summary: This September 1975 bulletin from an amateur astronomy club announces new officers and board members, and highlights recent astronomical events including the co-discovery of Comet 1975-h by club members and a personal account of observing Nova Cygni. It recaps past club activities like star parties and general meetings, noting attendance and technical talks given. The bulletin concludes with a schedule of upcoming club events, including general meetings, star parties, and a board meeting.

articles.title: CONSTITUTIONAL REVISION:
articles.summary: This document outlines proposed constitutional revisions for the San Jose Amateur Astronomers, dated August 1975. The amendments detail changes to officer election procedures, adjustments to the frequency and calling of Board of Directors meetings, and the addition of specific qualifications and termination conditions for Board membership. These revisions aim to clarify existing bylaws and add new provisions for organizational governance.
